from typing import List

import pandas as pd



[docs]def upper_cased_header(df: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:
    df.columns = [header.upper() for header in df.columns]
    return df




[docs]def fillna_mean(df: pd.DataFrame, columns: List[str]) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """Fill missing values with mean of a given column.

    Parameters
    ----------
    df: pd.DataFrame
        dataframe to apply cleaning
    columns: list of str
        list with the name of the columns to clean

    Returns
    -------
    df: pd.DataFrame
        dataframe

    """
    for column in columns:
        mean = df[column].mean()
        df[column] = df[column].fillna(mean)
    return df
